sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Fēijī zài kōngzhōng fēixíng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'avion vole dans le ciel.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The airplane is flying in the air.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Háizimen zài ànshàng wánshuǎ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les enfants jouent sur la rive.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The children are playing on the shore.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zuò zài wǒ pángbiān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est assis à côté de moi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is sitting beside me.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhìjīn méiyǒu rén zhīdào zhēnxiàng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Jusqu'à présent, personne ne connaît la vérité.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: To this day, no one knows the truth.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这是一个重要的研究课题。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī gè zhòngyào de yánjiū kètí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un sujet de recherche important.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is an important research topic.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yīshēng gěi tā zhùshè le yìmiáo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le médecin lui a injecté un vaccin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The doctor gave him a vaccine injection.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 民主是社会进步的标志。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Mínzhǔ shì shèhuì jìnbù de biāozhì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La démocratie est le signe du progrès social.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Democracy is a sign of social progress.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā dá le suǒyǒu de wèntí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a répondu à toutes les questions.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He answered all the questions.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nánnǚ bǐlì shì yī bǐ yī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le ratio hommes-femmes est de un pour un.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The male to female ratio is one to one.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā gǎndào fēicháng bù'ān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle se sent très inquiète.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She feels very uneasy.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 中国的出口贸易很发达。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhōngguó de chūkǒu màoyì hěn fādá.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le commerce d'exportation de la Chine est très développé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: China's export trade is very developed.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qīngchén de kōngqì hěn qīngxīn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'air du petit matin est très frais.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The early morning air is very fresh.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè běn shū zhèngzài yìnshuā zhōng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce livre est en cours d'impression.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This book is being printed.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Biǎomiàn shàng tā hěn píngjìng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: En apparence, il est très calme.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: On the surface, he is very calm.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè tiáo lù shì nánběi zǒuxiàng de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette route va du nord au sud.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This road runs north to south.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gǔrén xiāngxìn shén de cúnzài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les anciens croyaient en l'existence des dieux.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Ancient people believed in the existence of gods.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège xiāoxi lìng rén zhènjīng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette nouvelle est choquante.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This news is shocking.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nánxìng hé nǚxìng yīnggāi píngděng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les hommes et les femmes devraient être égaux.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Men and women should be equal.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 结果超出了我们的预期。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jiéguǒ chāochū le wǒmen de yùqī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les résultats ont dépassé nos attentes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The results exceeded our expectations.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yǒurén tōu le wǒ de qiánbāo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quelqu'un a volé mon portefeuille.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Someone stole my wallet.
